name: My Territory LITE
description:
My Territory LITE- trial free version. To view presents 3 levels of play.

Goals

The goal of the game is to capture the territory as much as possible.

Controls

Play by touching the screen and quickly dragging your finger-tip across the screen in any one of four directions: Up, Down, Left, Right. When you swipe the screen in a particular direction, Ladybird will travel as you directed.

Lives

At the beginning of the game you have three lives. Moving on to the next level you'll get extra life if you don't spend any ones. Also, your remaining lives will be saved when you move on to the next level. If you lose all lives, the game will be over.

Rules

Moving Ladybird on the light parts of the field you capture territory. The captured parts of the territory is painted in a dark color. Moving Ladybird on the light parts of the field you need to be afraid the bombs. If a bomb hit to Ladybird or on its track you'll lose a life. Ladybird's movement on its track is forbidden! Moving Ladybird on the dark parts of the field you need to avoid the bees. Every minute, the number of bees increases! When the territory is captured more than 70% of the field you'll be moved to the next level.

Bonus

At each level, can be found on the playing field objects bonuses.
Bonuses are added glasses and help in the game.

The game results are stored in memory. You can see 10 best results in the STATISTIC table.

Program is written on "smart BASIC" for iOS programming language and is published in App Store using "smart BASIC" SDK for Xcode.
